<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212419</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tardigrades: Bears of the Moss</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tardigrades: Bären des Mooses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tardigrades : Ours de la mousse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tardigrades: Ursos do musgo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tardigrades: Orsi del muschio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Tardigrades: Αντέχει του βρύου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tardigrades: Osos del musgo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This online PowerPoint presentation is dedicated to the phylum Tardigrada. It discusses distinguishing characteristics of Tardigrades (also known as water bears), their relationship to arthropods and nematodes, internal structures, life stages, cryptobiosis, research opportunities, classification, identification, habitat, distribution, ease of study in the lab, and more. Each slide contains illustrations and descriptions of the microscopic animal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese OnlinepowerPoint Darstellung wird dem Phylum 
Tardigrada eingesetzt. Es behandelt unterscheidene Eigenschaften
von Tardigrades (alias Wasserbären), ihr Verhältnis zu den 
Gliederfüßern und zu den Fadenwürmern, interne Strukturen, 
Lebenstadien, cryptobiosis, Forschung Gelegenheiten, Klassifikation, 
Kennzeichen, Lebensraum, Verteilung, Mühelosigkeit der Studie im 
Labor und mehr. Jedes Plättchen enthält Abbildungen und 
Beschreibungen des mikroskopischen Tieres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette présentation en ligne de PowerPoint est 
consacrée au phylum Tardigrada. Il discute des 
caractéristiques de distinction de Tardigrades (également connu sous
le nom de des ours de l'eau), leur rapport avec des arthropodes et des
nématodes, des structures internes, des étapes de la vie, 
cryptobiosis, des occasions de recherches, classification, 
identification, habitat, distribution, facilité d'étude dans le 
laboratoire, et plus. Chaque glissière contient des 
illustrations et des descriptions de l'animal microscopique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta apresentação em linha de PowerPoint é 
dedicada ao phylum Tardigrada. Discute características 
distinguindo de Tardigrades (conhecido também como ursos da água), 
seu relacionamento aos artrópodes e aos nematodes, estruturas 
internas, estágios da vida, cryptobiosis, oportunidades da pesquisa, 
classificação, identificação, habitat, distribuição, facilidade 
do estudo no laboratório, e mais. Cada corrediça contem 
ilustrações e descrições do animal microscópico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa presentazione in linea del PowerPoint è 
dedicata al phylum Tardigrada. Discute le caratteristiche di 
distinzione di Tardigrades (anche conosciuto come orsi dell'acqua), il
loro rapporto agli artropodi ed ai nematodi, le strutture interne, le 
fasi di vita, il cryptobiosis, le occasioni di ricerca, la 
classificazione, l'identificazione, l'habitat, la distribuzione, la 
facilità dello studio in laboratorio e più. Ogni scorrevole 
contiene le illustrazioni e le descrizioni dell'animale microscopico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η σε απευθείας σύνδεση παρουσίαση PowerPoint 
αφιερώνεται στο phylum Tardigrada. Συζητά τα ιδιαίτερα 
χαρακτηριστικά Tardigrades (επίσης γνωστού ως ύδωρ αντέχει), 
της σχέσης τους στα αρθρόποδα και nematodes, τις εσωτερικές 
δομές, τα στάδια ζωής, το cryptobiosis, τις ερευνητικές 
ευκαιρίες, την ταξινόμηση, τον προσδιορισμό, το βιότοπο, τη 
διανομή, την ευκολία της μελέτης στο εργαστήριο, και 
περισσότεροι. Κάθε φωτογραφική διαφάνεια περιέχει τις 
απεικονίσεις και τις περιγραφές του μικροσκοπικού ζώου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta presentación en línea de PowerPoint se 
dedica al phylum Tardigrada. Discute características que 
distinguen de Tardigrades (también conocido como los osos del agua), 
su lazo a los artrópodos y a los nematodos, las estructuras internas,
las etapas de la vida, cryptobiosis, oportunidades de la 
investigación, la clasificación, la identificación, el habitat, la 
distribución, la facilidad del estudio en el laboratorio, y más. 
Cada diapositiva contiene ilustraciones y descripciones del 
animal microscópico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
